abilities.name: Fellow Boost
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a basic Energy card from your hand to your Latias, Latias ex, Latios or Latios ex. If you do, your turn ends. This power can't be used if Latias ex is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Power Crush
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Knocked Out by this attack, discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Latias ex.
